elements.name: When a PATCH request with valid credentials, a non-existing (id), and correct data (title) is sent to the
elements.description:
/api/updateProductCategory/{id} endpoint, confirm that the returned status code is 203, the remark in the response body is
  "failed", and the message is "There is not product category for this id."

steps.name: The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token.
The api user sets "api/updateProductCategory52145" path parameters.
The api user prepares a PATCH request containing the "Education and Training" information to send to the api updateProductCategory endpoint.

steps.name: The api user sends a "PATCH" request and saves the returned response.
The api user verifies that the status code is 203.
The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "failed".
The api user verifies that the "data.message" information in the response body is "There is not product category for this id.".

arguments.val: "There is not product category for this id."

name: As an administrator, I want to update the information of the product category with the specified ID via an API connection.
